Name: Somerholm
About the game: Somerholm is a photography based island generator with a focus on customizing the islands you explore and having control over numerous camera options. Discover various points of interest while exploring islands you create and take photographs along the way to fill your photo gallery. FEATURES Numerous Generation Options Whether you want to change the overall island height or just how many trees are generated the choice is up to you. Of course you can always leave everything completely randomized for a fresh experience. At Least A Few Camera Options Change the brightness, contrast, field of view, saturation, color depth, resolution, and more in real time while taking photos to get the perfect shot. Intrigue Awaits Discover various Points Of Interest while exploring the various islands of Somerholm; ranging from fire pits, to buildings, to watchtowers, and more. A Unique Art Style Explore islands in a charming simplistic view, reminiscent of limited color depth stock photos of the wild. Discovery A Left Behind Story While exploring islands, come across and purchase locations to notes that are left behind by others. Piece together a story that happened before your appearance on the islands. Photo Gallery View taken photos while exploring the island or view all photos taken of your previous journeys in your journal.
